html:
7.9.22  10:44 am   What are bananas made of?

      banana

7.9.22  10:11 am   ever done any songs / parts of songs in mixolydian?

      yes i'm sure. "in california" seems entirely mixolydian for the verses. "i'm scared" seems to be hovering around mixolydian for the verses, at least in spirit

7.9.22  9:32 am   Where do I locate the ground plane?

      it's right here

7.9.22  8:15 am   Can you write a movie review as an answer to this question?

      cut out the middle man.... i'd rather just write a movie

7.9.22  7:18 am   *blank* goes the weasel. 

      it most certainly does

7.9.22  4:17 am   what is your favourite building?

      the... earth

7.8.22  11:58 pm   What's your preferred drum shoe?

      the snare

7.8.22  11:46 pm   Is your next song about sunshine, or the sun?

      no

7.8.22  11:11 pm   what can you do when you're bored

      never bored. too frightened

7.8.22  11:00 pm   How do you come up with lyrics for your songs?

      togther with the music

7.8.22  9:51 pm   How do you make your videos?

      we'll see

7.8.22  9:23 pm   I've realized that frequently I'll improvise a recording in a few hours based off how i'm feeling and whatever idea i'm messing around with, but because it's taken me so long to feel comfortable with my singing voice i still struggle with adding lyrics and vocals. how would you recommend I work at this?

      adding lyrics and vocals to an already existing piece of music might be a weird and challenging puzzle. instead you might want to try writing the song with the words already in it. if you enjoy improvising, you should try improvising with words. it can be a wild time

7.8.22  9:00 pm   is the next song about space

      no

7.8.22  4:21 pm   What should I do with my writers block? I feel like I can't write anymore because I'm scared of disappointing my readers 

      there's nothing you can do to guarantee you won't disappoint the readers. so in that sense, you're right back where you were when you started. so hopefully that can take the pressure off

7.8.22  3:57 pm   any thoughts on the effect of iii - vi - ii - V repeating

      could be useful

7.8.22  2:29 pm   whats mixed voice and how do i do

      i don't really know. my only trick is to imagine that the lyrics are true

7.8.22  2:16 pm   what's your favourite tree?

      all trees are part of the same tree, which is my fav

7.8.22  1:55 pm   i'm assuming the answer yes but still did you model your own chess pieces for huge gamer?

     yes

      if so, how long did it take for every unique piece?

     they were all very quick except for the knight

     actually i would love to hear about whatever you have on this topic... 

     even though i was starting directly at a picture of the horse, it seemed totally impossible to get it to look right. that's when i truly realized how sensitive the face-recognition tools in our brain is

7.8.22  1:55 pm   What do you think of the first four chords in Joe Hisaishi's "One Summer's Day"?

     dense

     Could you explain it through your version of music theory?

     after listening to a bit more of the song for some context, the first 2 chords seem to be implying Fmaj7, and Cmaj7/E with C on top. you'd expect the next chord to be Dmin7 except of course there's this Bb note on top that sticks out like a sharp knife. and the fourth chord sounds like a huge amount of stacked fourths. probably just fourths stacked all the way from middle C# until you get up to D

7.8.22  1:45 pm   what do i do if i have an interest i want to talk about but no one wants to listen to me talk about it and i'm scared they'll think i'm an annoying weirdo!?

      start a blogcast about it

7.8.22  1:35 pm   bill what do you think of tungsten?

      never heard of it

7.8.22  12:55 pm   Does Jesus rhyme with peaches? 

      enough for business purposes

7.8.22  12:42 pm   do you actively avoid making music that people could classify under a genre, or is that just the way the cookie crumbled?

      just trying to get by

7.8.22  11:35 am   what is drama

      that's when one person goes for a handshake and the other person goes for a fist bump

7.8.22  10:29 am   favorite ride at the carnival, fairground or midway?

      the escalator

7.8.22  9:44 am   What do you think about math?

      dank, especially with all the equality

7.8.22  9:18 am   What are your thoughts on kiwi birds?

      i've never thought about kiwi birds, but i will

7.8.22  7:42 am   what is success  

      you name it

7.8.22  3:31 am   what's your least favorite flavor of ice cream?

      egg

7.8.22  3:09 am   what should i do when there's nothing else left to do 

      make up something new

7.8.22  2:27 am   so you said you need to deliver a message while singing to do it better, what if i want to sing your song? whats the message

      the song

7.8.22  1:53 am   Are you an animator

      enough to get by

7.8.22  12:01 am   Do you think chords are implicit in the melody?

     about 70% yes

      If so, do you think reharmonizing is nothing more than a fun exercise? I kinda think so

      often the best chords are already there. but also quite often the original artist might miss a golden opportunity

7.7.22  11:58 pm   what do you think of metal music?

      it's very sensual

7.7.22  11:07 pm   i have always had a weird habit where whenever I see something cool, i can't just say "that's cool" and move on, i feel like i need to make something similar, or just wish i had made said thing. this leads to a ton of interests, nearly none of which i can appease, and i just don't know what path to take. how do i come to terms with the fact that i can't be everything at once, and accept cool things for what they are?

      ok so you won't be able to hold onto all of infinity, but, see if you can find some 'rates' or 'pacing' that you can make your own. figure out your dream schedule. the cool news here is you already know you'll never run out of things to do

7.7.22  10:01 pm   can u please ignore this question?

      i'll see what i can do

7.7.22  9:58 pm   If every animal has a high jump contest, which animal will lose?

      prokaryote

7.7.22  9:51 pm   favorite board game?

      the board itself

7.7.22  9:36 pm   Everybody talks about Carl's Jr., but what about Carl's Sr.?

      it's the original version of the restaurant. probably larger, serving not-so-fast food

7.7.22  8:58 pm   does pineapple belong on pizza

      pineapple is pizza

7.7.22  7:04 pm   how to distinguish left from right

      just write down that question, and left is on the left and right is on the right

7.7.22  6:45 pm   is "throw me a challenge, make it unsolvable, and i'll have it worked out and set settled and sorted out by the morning"  in the ground plane true? can you do that?

     sometimes i try

     if so, here's my challenge: delete mars from the solar system

      that doesn't seem like a good idea

7.7.22  6:30 pm   What's the best musical chord in existence?

      the *other* one

      yes

7.7.22  5:06 pm   favourite article of clothing?

      the troposphere

7.7.22  4:59 pm   could you give me an example of a fun fact?

      a=a

      how much? nevermind, the answer is a medium amount

      sunshine
